plot: A crowd of friends get together for a certain time under one condition that no one is permitted to say a word until the time of togetherness is over.
title: Wordlessness
plot_es: A crowd of friends get together for a certain time under one condition that no one is permitted to say a word until the time of togetherness is over.
plot_en: A crowd of friends get together for a certain time under one condition that no one is permitted to say a word until the time of togetherness is over.
